purpose: The NC Department of Administration is using project results to inform NC internship program improvements.
question: What can we learn from applicant and intern data from the State of NC internship program?
deliverable: - Summaries of demographics of applicants; demographics of students offered internships; and recommendations for improvements to the NC internship program.
summary:
The state of NC internship program is an opportunity for North Carolina students to work in state government agencies. Using demographic data associated with applicants and accepted interns, the NC Department of Administration (NCDOA) studies information to learn about the students who apply to the internship program and the students who are accepted.

You can access the powerpoint [here](https://ncosbm.sharefile.com/d-se498230ec15b4a68bc151836392e5362).
title: Applicant Intern Data
